name: Premium Wireless Headphones
description: Experience crystal-clear sound with our premium wireless headphones featuring active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and premium comfort design.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Track your health and fitness goals with this advanced smartwatch featuring heart rate monitoring, GPS, and 7-day battery life.

name: Minimalist Leather Jacket
description: Classic genuine leather jacket with a modern minimalist design. Perfect for any season and pairs well with any outfit.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: Premium ergonomic office chair designed for all-day comfort with lumbar support, adjustable height, and breathable mesh material.

name: Professional Camera Kit
description: Complete professional camera kit with 24MP sensor, multiple lenses, tripod, and carrying case. Perfect for photography enthusiasts.

name: Organic Cotton T-Shirt
description: Soft and comfortable organic cotton t-shirt in classic fit. Available in multiple colors and made with sustainable materials.

name: Modern Table Lamp
description: Sleek modern table lamp with adjustable brightness and wireless charging base. Perfect for bedside or office use.

name: Running Shoes
description: High-performance running shoes with advanced cushioning technology and breathable mesh upper for maximum comfort during workouts.

name: Bestselling Novel Collection
description: Collection of 5 bestselling contemporary novels. Perfect for book lovers looking to expand their library with acclaimed titles.

name: Luxury Skincare Set
description: Complete luxury skincare routine with cleanser, serum, moisturizer, and eye cream. Made with premium natural ingredients.

name: Gaming Mechanical Keyboard
description: RGB backlit mechanical gaming keyboard with customizable keys, anti-ghosting technology, and premium tactile switches.

name: Designer Sunglasses
description: Premium designer sunglasses with UV protection, polarized lenses, and lightweight titanium frame. Includes luxury carrying case.

name: Smart Home Hub
description: Central control hub for your smart home devices. Compatible with voice assistants and supports over 100 different device types.

name: Indoor Plant Collection
description: Set of 4 low-maintenance indoor plants perfect for beginners. Includes decorative pots and care instructions for each plant.

name: Yoga Mat & Accessories Kit
description: Complete yoga starter kit with premium non-slip mat, blocks, strap, and carrying bag. Perfect for home or studio practice.

name: Cooking Masterclass Book
description: Professional cooking techniques and recipes from world-renowned chefs. Includes step-by-step photos and expert tips.

name: Premium Hair Care Bundle
description: Professional salon-quality hair care bundle with shampoo, conditioner, treatment mask, and styling serum for all hair types.

name: Wireless Charging Station
description: Multi-device wireless charging station that can charge up to 3 devices simultaneously. Compatible with all Qi-enabled devices.

name: Casual Button-Down Shirt
description: Versatile cotton button-down shirt perfect for work or casual wear. Available in multiple colors with a comfortable modern fit.

name: Decorative Wall Art Set
description: Set of 3 modern abstract wall art prints with premium frames. Perfect for living room, bedroom, or office decoration.
